caption:
#PressPlay: @k_o_abyss is doing phenomenal work! Black Anime is set to make a huge impact on the culture, and Knight of Abyss is at the forefront of this movement. ⁠
⁠
Creator Quintin Dorsey is a literary force whose stories have captivated readers worldwide with a profound gift for storytelling and a remarkable ability to evoke emotions. Now is your chance to own a piece of what could be a future top-five anime.⁠
⁠
With over 60 million Black anime fans across the African Diaspora, this community is vastly underrepresented. This is an untapped market with immense possibilities and immeasurable potential profitability.⁠
⁠
Will you be investing? Don't miss out on this groundbreaking opportunity! Head to wefunder.com/knightsofabyss and follow @k_o_abyss
